title: Quiz - Present Simple Negative Forms
description: Quiz sur les formes négatives du présent simple avec don't et doesn't

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
questions.explanation: With 'she', we use 'doesn't' + base form of verb (work, not works).

questions.question: What's the negative form of 'They speak French'?
questions.explanation: With 'they', we use 'don't' + base form: 'don't speak'.

questions.question: Which is the most common error with negative forms?
options: Adding -s to the main verb after 'doesn't'
questions.explanation: The most common error is saying 'doesn't works' instead of 'doesn't work'.

questions.question: Complete: 'My parents _____ watch TV in the evening.'
questions.explanation: 'My parents' is plural, so we use 'don't' (not 'doesn't').

questions.question: How do you say 'Il n'aime pas le café' in English?
questions.explanation: Correct form: 'He doesn't like coffee' (doesn't + base form).
